name: Pivot Pop
description:
Pivot Pop is a game of skill and endurance, it’s pretty difficult.
It requires some practice but you want it to be a challenge right? Easy is boring!

Pop the matching colors to earn points and pops. Avoid hitting the opposite colors to survive.

How to play
● Tap anywhere on the screen to change direction.
● If you collide with the colored lines the color of your ball will change.
● Pop the dots that match your color to earn points.
● Avoid hitting the opposite colors to stay live.

Features
● Over 100 individually crafted levels.
● Earn "POPS" to unlock awesome trails in shop.
● Smooth and challenging "one touch" gameplay.
● Share screenshots of your score with friends, family or foes.
● Stunning and colorful graphics
● Game Center Leaderboard

Please send all feedback to pivotpop@unclouded.studio.
We'd love to hear from you!
